Pre-Game Insights: India has an undefeated streak against Pakistan in the ICC World cup so far.
India won both their warm-up matches, beating England and Australia.
Pakistan defeated West Indies by seven wickets and lost to South Africa.
Both teams have the lethal bowling attack in T20 cricket.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch in Dubai has been excellent for batting but is slowing down slightly as the game progresses.
In the recently concluded IPL, nine out of 12 matches have been won by the chasing teams.
Batting first will not be a bad option considering the current pitch condition.
Others: India: KL Rahul, Rohit Sharma, Virat Kohli (c), Suryakumar Yadav, Rishabh Pant (wk), Hardik Pandya, Ravindra Jadeja, Shardul Thakur, Ravichandran Ashwin/Varun Chakravarthy, Jasprit Bumrah, Mohammad Shami
Pakistan: Mohammad Rizwan (wk), Babar Azam (c), Fakhar Zaman, Mohammad Hafeez, Shoaib Malik, Asif Ali, Hasan Ali, Shadab Khan, Imad Wasim, Shaheen Afridi, Haris Rauf
